mapper.select: SELECT c.common_no, c.name AS commonName, c.common_kind, c.image, c.content FROM common_item c ORDER BY c.common_no
SELECT c.common_no, c.name AS commonName, c.common_kind, c.image, c.content, c.date_select FROM common_item c WHERE c.common_no = #{commonNo}

SELECT r.common_kind, r.common_name, r.reser_date, r.reser_start_time, r.reser_end_time, r.usage_status, r.reser_no, r.content, c.image FROM reser r JOIN common_item c ON r.common_no = c.common_no ORDER BY r.reser_date DESC
SELECT r.*, c.image FROM reser r JOIN common_item c ON r.common_no = c.common_no WHERE r.reser_no = #{reserNo}
